product.name: CtrlChecks
product.tagline: Build automations that think. Connect anything. Automate everything.
product.description: CtrlChecks is an AI-native workflow automation platform that lets you visually build workflows to connect apps, automate tasks, and deploy AI-powered automations without coding. Think of it as Zapier or n8n, but built from the ground up with AI capabilities integrated into every workflow node.

faqs.question: What can I build with CtrlChecks?
faqs.answer: You can build almost any automation! Common examples include lead enrichment workflows, customer onboarding processes, social media posting schedules, automated reporting systems, data synchronization between apps, and AI-powered content generation. The possibilities are endless - if you can imagine it, you can likely build it with CtrlChecks.

faqs.question: How is CtrlChecks different from Zapier or n8n?
faqs.answer: CtrlChecks is AI-native, meaning AI capabilities are built into every workflow node - not added as an afterthought. Compared to n8n, we have a more intuitive interface that's easier for non-technical users. Compared to Zapier, we offer more flexibility in workflow logic and better pricing for high-volume users. Plus, you can deploy workflows as APIs, chatbots, or scheduled jobs - giving you more deployment options.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our free plan includes 500 runs per month, which is perfect for getting started, testing workflows, and building small automations. You get access to all core features, including the drag-and-drop builder and all integrations.

faqs.question: Do I need to know how to code?
faqs.answer: Not at all! CtrlChecks is designed as a no-code platform. You can build complex workflows using our visual drag-and-drop interface. However, if you're a developer or want to add custom logic, we do offer optional code support for advanced use cases.

faqs.question: What apps and services can I connect?
faqs.answer: We support 300+ popular applications including Google Workspace (Gmail, Sheets, Drive), Slack, Salesforce, HubSpot, GitHub, Notion, Airtable, and many more. We're constantly adding new integrations based on user requests. If you need a specific integration, let us know!

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We take data security very seriously. All data is encrypted at rest and in transit. We follow industry best practices for security. Enterprise plans include additional security features, compliance certifications, and the option for self-hosting if you need complete control over your data.

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply sign up for a free account - no credit card required. Once you're in, you can start building workflows immediately using our drag-and-drop editor. We also have a template library with pre-built workflows you can use as starting points. Check out our demo videos if you want to see it in action first!

faqs.question: Can I deploy workflows as APIs?
faqs.answer: Yes! One of CtrlChecks' unique features is that you can deploy your workflows in multiple ways: as REST APIs, as chatbots, or as scheduled jobs. This gives you flexibility in how you use your automations - call them from your apps, embed them as chatbots, or run them on a schedule.

faqs.question: What kind of AI models can I use?
faqs.answer: CtrlChecks supports multiple AI models including GPT (OpenAI), Gemini (Google), and you can also connect custom AI models. AI capabilities are built into workflow nodes, so you can easily add AI processing to any step of your automation.
